data.title: Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribe
data.meta_description: Visit our Executive Committee web page to learn about the dedicated leaders guiding our tribe towards a prosperous future.
data.text:
Executive

The Bylaws of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribe, Article I, Duties of Officers, Section 1 - 4 establishes the roles of our Executive Council, which consists of a President, Vice President, Secretary and Treasurer, who is an appointed position. These officers are elected by the General Council, which is composed of eligible community members. Officers are elected to 4 year staggered terms providing continuity and stability to the community.

Trustees

By Laws of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribe, Article I, Duties of Officers, Section 5 Trustees establishes the rolls of the Trustees, who by law are elected to assist the Executive Council with the execution of their duties and responsibilities. These trustees are elected by the General Council, which is composed of eligible community members. Trustees are elected to 4 year staggered terms and providing continuity and stability to the community.
